meanings.definition: A person who creates or prepares something, especially food or drinks.
meanings.sent1: The talented concoctors in the kitchen whipped up a delicious meal for the family.
meanings.sent2: The pastry chef is known as one of the best concoctors in town.
meanings.sent3: The young concoctors tried to make a cake but ended up with a messy kitchen instead.
meanings.sent4: The concoctors of flavors in the ice cream shop created a taste explosion in every scoop.
meanings.sent5: The concoctors at the smoothie bar blended fruits into refreshing drinks for the customers.

meanings.definition: A group of people who collaborate to create or invent something.
meanings.sent1: The team of concoctors brainstormed ideas for the new product launch.
meanings.sent2: The concoctors at the design studio worked together to come up with innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The group of young concoctors put their heads together to build a robot for the science fair.
meanings.sent4: The concoctors of the plan carefully strategized each step to ensure success.
meanings.sent5: The talented concoctors of the music band harmonized perfectly during their performance.
